summary:
It's time to feel like an arcane scholar!

Internalized Knowledge is a mod that will let you craft a spell tome that
will grant you a permanent 10% cost reduction to spells of the relevant school. All you have to do is find all five skill books of that school of magic, bring it to a cooking pot, and craft it!
descriptionHtml:
It's time to feel like an arcane scholar!

Internalized Knowledge is a mod that will let you craft a spell tome that
will grant you a permanent 10% cost reduction to spells of the relevant school. All you have to do is find all five skill books of that school of magic, bring it to a cooking pot, and craft it! Afterwards, just use the tome produced, and the buff will be applied!
author: LunarMagister7
